sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access/>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.ErrorMsg</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Class providing a way to reliably extract a meaningful error message from whatever was thrown to a catch block.</description>
        <name>ErrorMsg</name>
        <script><![CDATA[gs.include("PrototypeServer");

/*
 * Implements a mechanism to reliably extract a meaningful error message from whatever was thrown to a catch block.
 */
var ErrorMsg = Class.create();

ErrorMsg.prototype = {
    initialize: function(msg, error) {
        this.msg = msg;
        this.errMsg = '' + error;
        if (error instanceof Error) 
            this.errMsg = error.name + ' - ' + error.message;
    },
    
    toString: function() {
        return this.msg + this.errMsg;
    },
    
    type: 'ErrorMsg'
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>glide.maint</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2008-04-05 18:13:29</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>1fc9ec830ab301bf00a5b6983bd78225</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>ErrorMsg</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Orchestration - Runtime" source="com.snc.runbook_automation.runtime">f3d67d412f140110d8a4d5f62799b6d1</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1fc9ec830ab301bf00a5b6983bd78225</sys_update_name>

        <sys_updated_on>2008-04-05 18:37:20</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>538</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
